body: Can't read it. So I'm guessing the son's a roach whisperer that lives in pile of shit, his mommy feels pity and cleans for his lazy ass and is fucking her because no woman would go near his smelly dirty ass? Got it..! Or maybe the son is an alien roach from MIB, Will Smith shows up later and smacks some sense into him. Either way, those last few pages are fucking disgusting, I'm out.
it looks a lot like haitoku sensei, but then not at all. it must be someone who works with them. i'm not a fan of the shota or the garbage.
